name: UrbaNest
desc: UrbanNest is a MERN stack-based platform for property listings, offering features like user authentication, property search, and detailed descriptions, enabling users to buy, sell, or rent properties with ease.

name: Vasibuy
desc: VashisBuy is a MERN stack e-commerce website offering secure user authentication, diverse product categories, seamless payment options, and real-time order tracking for an efficient online shopping experience.

name: Temperature Converter
desc: The Temperature Converter is a web application built with the MERN stack, allowing users to easily convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. It provides a simple, intuitive interface for quick conversions.

name: VashiSpendr
desc: VashiSpendr is a personal finance management app built with the MERN stack. It helps users track their expenses, set budgets, and analyze spending patterns for better financial planning.
